text: Louis Marc (born 27 July 1880, date of death unknown) was a French swimmer. He competed in two swimming events and the water polo at the 1900 Summer Olympics, winning a bronze medal in the latter. ==See also== * List of Olympic medalists in water polo ==References== ==External links== * Category:1880 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Olympic water polo players of France Category:Swimmers at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for France Category:Olympic medalists in water polo Category:Medalists at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Nord (French department)
title: Louis Marc
